Waltham.Abel Allen House:
The Abel Allen House is a historic house located at 1 Chestnut Street in Weston, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
With a construction history that is believed to date back to the last decade of the 17th century, the 2.5 story wood-frame house is claimed to be the oldest building in Weston. The house was extensively rehabilitated in 1961, at which time the restorer identified at least six different phases of construction.
